nombre: Madrid Marriott Auditorium Hotel & Conference Center
descripcion: Madrid Marriott Auditorium Hotel & Conference Center, located between International Airport and city center, is the perfect place to hold any kind of event and conference with innovation and style. 56 panelled and no column meeting rooms with 3,70 high, wide galleries for conventions, exhibitions and fairs as well as the impressive Auditorium for up to 2.000 seats make it one of the most exclusive and unique areas of Europe. 869 rooms, an extensive variety of restaurant spaces as the new concept in Madrid Buffet, the exclusive Executive Lounge for Marriott Bonvoy Members, an important Fitness Center area as well as free shuttle service every 30 minutes to the Airport are some of the services that you will find. But the most important one: you will be taken care of by a Senior Event Team specialized in MICE making sure your event is a success making you feel like home.

descripcion: The Hotel Riu Plaza España opened its doors in August 2019. The Edificio España is the 8th tallest building in Madrid, Spain, and one of the city's most iconic buildings. It is an example of 20th-century Spanish architecture built in the neo-baroque style. Only approx. 20 km away from the Madrid-Barajas Adolfo Suárez (MAD) airport. It is ideal for both leisure and business travel. The 584 modern designed, lovingly decorated rooms with free Wi-Fi offer maximum comfort as well as relaxation and in our 17 stylish and modern conference rooms you can successfully organize your events and meetings. For lovers of gastronomy, we offer our guest a buffet restaurant, as well as a Sky Bar and Lobby Bar for snacks & drinks.

The newly opened NH Collection Madrid Gran Via is in the heart of one of Madrid's most iconic streets. This city center hotel is in an ideal location for shopping at designer boutiques, as well as exploring Gran Via's restaurants, coffee shops, book stores and cocktail bars. The hotel is within walking distance of central attractions, including La Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor, Plaza Espana.

This emblematic Hotel in the Gran Via of Madrid is strategically located in the heart of the city, a few meters from the Plaza de Cibeles and Puerta del Sol. The hotel is composed by two buildings of great architectural value that are from the early twentieth century and are also very close to the Prado Museum and the Thyssen Gallery, allowing maximum enjoyment of the cultural offer of Madrid. In addition, the hotel offers its guests a fantastic restaurant called "Bloved" and its Bloved Veggie Corner, a Gastro Bar called "nnueve 9 Madrid" and 4 meeting rooms for all kinds of events, and some free services such as free Wi-Fi high speed internet, Business Corner, Fitness Center and terrace on the sixth floor with a heated water area overlooking Gran Via.
